nodes.text: PO-12 was the designation of a protocol droid, located at Lord Grathan's estate on Dromund Kaas, during the Cold War. He boasts that he is fluent in over 100 forms of communications and dialects.

PO-12 is believed by some fans to be voiced by Anthony Daniels, who is uncredited in the cast and crew list. PO-12 and his fretful demeanor is a nod to Daniels character of C-3PO, who also used to boast of being 'fluent in over six million forms of communication and dialects.'  However, it is obviously Tom Kane voicing the character.
